title: Excellent Concept App
comment: I would like to congratulate the developer to come out with such an excellent concept to explore the contents of the storage. I recently bought Google Nexus 7, 32GB 3g/4G which got automatically upgraded to Kitkat 4.4.2 OS. I bought OTG cable to connect external SD Ram, and I am happy to see this app provide interface to the OTG connected RAM, as well as Google Drive in the same window, which makes easy transfer of data from one to another.  However, when I changed the RAM card, your app is not refreshing the contents of the new SD RAM, so please correct this issue at the earliest.

title: Nice app, but no way to enlarge image thumbnails
comment: This app continually crashes on an Asus TF700T. Click a folder, and crash to home screen.  [Updated Review]  6 months later and the crashes are fixed. Of all the file manager reviews I've posted, this developer is the only one who addressed my issue. As for the app (now that it works), it has a nice interface and everything is well organized. However, like most other file managers, it suffers from "small image thumbnail syndrome". There simply isn't a way to increase the size of the thumbnails. I do give kudos for the "pre-cache" mode and the check box option over each file/folder. I see a lot of potential here. Raising my rating from 1 star to 3 star.
Please try the latest version. If it still crashes, please send us an email.

title: Got GoogleTV??   Get OpenExplorer File Manager!!!
comment: I've tried MANY others, but on my stock Logitech Revue GTV, OpenExporer has proven to be the most stable (Wow, even in Beta!).  It's also by FAR the quickest, most intuitive file manager to install & start using immediately w/o any of the frustrating flailing around I usually find myself doing w/ other file browsers just to figure out which button does (or even more likely, does not do) what.  Even with the many things it can do, OpenExplorer maintains a clean look & a very much appreciated logical layout.  So....Got GoogleTV?  Get OpenExplorer Beta!  Because it just plain works!  Thanks to the Dev for all the hard work & continuing updates & improvements!

title: Amazing already
